text: Allah ndivo vakasika matenga nepasi pano, uye nezvose zviri mukati pamazuva matanhatu, ndokusimuka vachienda pamusoro pechigaro chavo cheumambo (nenzira inofanira humambo hwavo). Kwamuri imi vanhu hakuna kana anokwanisa kuita semubatsiri, muchengetedzi kana mumiriri kusara kwavo (Allah). Ko hamusimbozvirangarirawo here
